trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of a control on the Microsoft Office Menu, a group of controls on a built-in tab, or a tab among built-in or custom tabs.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Microsoft Office 菜单上控件的位置、内置选项卡上控件组的位置或者内置选项卡或自定义选项卡中选项卡的位置。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionType> is used by <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition> to specify the position of a Ribbon element in relation to other elements.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionType>由<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition>以指定相对于其他元素的功能区元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionType> to move a custom group into a certain position on a built-in tab. For more information, see [How to: Customize a Built-in Tab](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md).
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionType>将自定义组上的内置选项卡移动到某个位置。有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 自定义内置选项卡](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-customize-a-built-in-tab.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition> to move custom controls in relation to other controls on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition>将相对于 Microsoft Office 菜单上的其他控件的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将控件添加到 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view.md)。

trans-unit.source: To specify a particular built-in element, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition.OfficeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定特定的内置元素，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition.OfficeId%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A list of Office ID values is available at the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).
trans-unit.target: Office ID 值的列表位于 Microsoft 下载中心网页[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。

trans-unit.source: Put your control after a built-in control.
trans-unit.target: 将控件放在内置控件之后。

trans-unit.source: Put your control before a built-in control.
trans-unit.target: 将控件放在内置控件之前。

trans-unit.source: Put your control last, at the end of the Microsoft Office Menu, tab, or Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 将控件放在最后，在 Microsoft Office 菜单、选项卡或功能区末尾。

trans-unit.source: Buttons and groups appear after all of the existing buttons and groups.
trans-unit.target: 按钮和组显示在所有现有按钮和组之后。

trans-unit.source: Custom tabs are added to the end of the tabs list.
trans-unit.target: 自定义选项卡添加到选项卡列表末尾。
